pr_title: Fix to prevent a race condition in continuation token.

timeline.message: Fix to prevent a race condition in continuation token. This was part of the earlier V4 branch, but got overwritten during merge.

timeline.bodyText: I remember this was fixed earlier. Did we undo this somehow?
timeline.author: moderakh

replies.bodyText: Yes. Got lost in the v4->master merge as discussed offline.
replies.author: mbhaskar

replies.bodyText:
@mbhaskar  @moderakh  - I checked the PR logs - and this PR was never created against V4.
It was only fixed on v2 and v3 SDK, not on V4 SDK - https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pulls?q=is%3Apr+author%3Ambhaskar+is%3Aclosed
replies.author: kushagraThapar
kushagraThapar
